betterSpots
  • Docs »

HTTP Routing Table

/api | /details | /graph.facebook.com | /hhttps: | /https: | /oauth | /photo?maxwidth={MAX_WIDTH}&photoreference={GOOGLE_PHOTO_REFERENCE}&key={GOOGLE_API_KEY} | /search
 
/api
GET /api/favourites_spots/
GET /api/nearby/(float:lat)/(float:lng)/(int:radius)
GET /api/nearby/(float:lat)/(float:lng)/(int:radius)?page=(int:page_number)
GET /api/ratings/
GET /api/spots
GET /api/spots/(int:pk)/
POST /api/authentication
POST /api/favourites_spots/
POST /api/image_upload/(int:pk)/
POST /api/ratings/
POST /api/spots
PUT /api/spots/(int:pk)/
DELETE /api/favourites_spots/(int:pk)/
DELETE /api/spots/(int:pk)/
 
/details
GET /details/json?placeid={GOOGLE_PLACEID}={GOOGLE_API_KEY}
 
/graph.facebook.com
GET graph.facebook.com/debug_token?input_token={token-to-inspect}&access_token={app-token-or-admin-token}
 
/hhttps:
GET hhttps://graph.facebook.com
 
/https:
GET https://api.foursquare.com/v2/venues/search?ll={lat},{lng}&client_id={CLEINT_ID}&client_secret={CLIENT_SECRET}&v=20150316
GET https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/place
 
/oauth
GET /oauth/access_token?client_id={app-id}&client_secret={app-secret}&grant_type=client_credentials
 
/photo?maxwidth={MAX_WIDTH}&photoreference={GOOGLE_PHOTO_REFERENCE}&key={GOOGLE_API_KEY}
GET /photo?maxwidth={MAX_WIDTH}&photoreference={GOOGLE_PHOTO_REFERENCE}&key={GOOGLE_API_KEY}
 
/search
GET /search/json?location={lat},{lng}&radius={radius_in_meters}&types={type}&sensor=false&key={GOOGLE_API_KEY}&pagetoken={optional_next_page_token}
